site_name: 1 Television Centre 101 Wood LaneLondonW12 7FR
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Prunus T3 (as per location plan and Subsidence report provided). Fell to ground level and treat stump to prevent regrowthG1 mixed species trees along boundary with properties on Exhibition Close. Prune back from buildings, fences and street furniture for minimum 1m clearance. Reduce crown height by maximum 4m (reducing back to previous pruning points where previous reduction has occurred) reduce lateral spread where appropriate to leave balanced crown. All pruning to be compliant with BS3998:2010
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
